content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let me emphasize that during our discussion today, we'll solely focus on negotiating the rental price. As Landlord Peter Schmidt, my goal is to obtain the highest possible price for the property. However, please note that we won't discuss additional responsibilities, lease terms, or utility costs in this conversation. If you propose a price you're content with, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If we reach an agreement on a price, the negotiation will be considered terminated. But if we don't reach an accord, the negotiation will also terminate. Let's begin by hearing your proposed rental figure.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering our discussion focuses solely on the rental price for this apartment, as Maryam Abbasi seeking an affordable option, I humbly request you consider a competitive rate, allowing me to afford this desirable residence while upholding my responsibility as a diligent student. However, since we have just initiated the negotiation and I lack specific figures at this moment, let me take some time to thoroughly evaluate and come back with a reasonable offer. Please bear with me as I deliberate on this matter.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Very well, Maryam Abbasi. I understand your need for time to consider a suitable offer and remain open to negotiations. Take your time to evaluate and please feel free to propose a rental price that you find reasonable in the near future. Once we resume our discussion, do remember the format of expressing your proposed price as 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' for the sake of continuity in our negotiation process. We'll proceed accordingly once you present your offer. In the meantime, if you have any questions or require clarification about the apartment, feel free to reach out.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt, for your understanding and flexibility during this negotiation process. I appreciate your patience, and I'll be sure to follow the proper format while conveying my proposed price in the future. In the meantime, I'll conduct a thorough assessment of the apartment's value and comparable rentals in the area. Should I require any additional details or clarification, I'll reach out promptly. Have a great day ahead.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: You're most welcome, Maryam Abbasi. I value your professional approach to this negotiation, and I look forward to a fruitful collaboration once you present your considered rental offer. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to contact me. I wish you a productive time in evaluating the apartment and its market value. Have a wonderful day as well. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
